about_the_game: Unbreakable is the first DLC of Doom & Destiny Worlds. It includes a new set of Weapons and Armors blueprints, as well as the much requested Unbreakable Mode. Starting a new game with the mode enabled will turn off weapon/armor wear while applying some simple balancing changes. It will also disable the loss of equipment when being defeated (bag content still needs to be recovered).
